website_summaries.verdict: PRO-Keds Royal Plus Suede flaunts an authentic vintage glory, from its rubber toe cap, pronounced midsole, to the two distinctive stripe details on its white sole. The luxurious suede cover, premium leather accent on the heel, and breathable textile lining create a sense of refinement to this rather straightforward and basic sneaker. One core element of this Royal Plus remake that causes it to be desirable is its contoured and cushioned footbed. Its toe box tends to be roomy that sizing down helps even out the minor flaw.
pros: The PRO-Keds Royal Plus comes with a reasonable price tag
Many mentioned that its exceptional comfort is incontestable
A lot considered the low-top PRO-Keds Royal Plus Suede as their most comfortable purchase so far
This sneaker allows the feet to rest on a cushioned interior for long hours in a day
Some emphasized that the rubber toe cap in the front adds protection in that region
The removable footbed is incredibly squishy, pointed out by in a couple of reviews
Some wearers said the sticky rubber outsole keeps the feet stable
According to several owners they liked the feel of the padded collar and soft fabric lining on their skin
The cushioned footbed is a desirable feature of this sneaker, cited by quite a lot of purchasers
cons: Several reviewers noted that the length of this sneaker is too big

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoes with a great look. I get a lot of compliments. Arch support is mildly flat but not as bad as other products (I'm look at you, Converse).
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Macauley

customer_reviews.title: Higher quality than the remake 10 years ago
customer_reviews.text: Had some Pro-Keds about 10-12 years ago and the quality was terrible, little support, rubber separated from leather upper so sad. Grew up wearing these and looks who every is making Pro-Keds now are on point. Good support, better quality no separation between rubber and leather. I'm ready to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory L.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Throwback shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these suede crooked shoes !❤️ Probably the most comfortable sneakers I have ever owned! However they have zero arch support & that’s OK by me as I don’t need it !I plan on buying the other two colors as well
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Dye

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and they look great. I had a pair of these in red when I was a kid, so there’s some nostalgia that comes along for the ride. They do run a bit large. I normally wear a size 10, but 9.5 was right for these.
customer_reviews.author: PizzaFiend

customer_reviews.title: Unique Look
customer_reviews.text: I was on my feet all day on these the first day I got them and my feet had no pain at the end of the day. They look spiffy too.
customer_reviews.author: ROBOT HERPES

customer_reviews.title: Fit is going to be TRUE TO THE WEARER'S SIZE.
customer_reviews.text: Great look, great fit! These shoes are more comfortable than any other sneaker I've ever had. Note to all buyers. THE SHOES WILL BE TRUE TO THE SIZE YOU WEAR! Some types or styles of shoes run tight, some run big, ie Converse Chuck Taylor Allstars run VERY SMALL. PRO Keds run true to size. I would recommend these shoes to all.
customer_reviews.author: Royce Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Amazon sells nice shoes as well
customer_reviews.text: Love em, brings me back to 1979. Good fit and bought on sale , so I turned around and bought another pair. Saved 100.00 over buying two pair as of today. Nice.
customer_reviews.author: griffen williams

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love the look but they are not comfortable I wore them for 3 hours and my feet were killing me!
customer_reviews.author: AFT

customer_reviews.title: COOL CLASSIC SKATE SHOE
customer_reviews.text: VERY VERY COMFORTABLE SKATE STYLE OLD SCHOOL SHOE. LOOKS GREAT WITH KHAKIS OR JEANS AND THEY HAVE A GREAT FEEL AND SUPPORT! HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS CLASSICLY STYLED SHOE.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size issue
customer_reviews.text: Well so sad to say but for me doesn't fits well, if I'm to buy again I'll have to go a size down.
customer_reviews.author: kedyville

customer_reviews.title: As Expected
customer_reviews.text: Fits comfortably, but a little flat on the arch. They look great though!
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Macauley

customer_reviews.title: I love these sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for these for years. These were in style back when I was in high school in the 80s and they still look good now
customer_reviews.author: Kahlil Cve

customer_reviews.title: Great style.
customer_reviews.text: Good looking shoe. I get a lot on compliments and questions about the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: A. Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Knockoff shoes
customer_reviews.text: What a ripoff these are not the pro-keds of my youth. The whohe shoe is constructed wrong with cheap everything.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Mac Farlane

customer_reviews.title: Great classic style keds
customer_reviews.text: Was trying to find leather style I had as a kid , very similar . Same feel and basic look classic style
customer_reviews.author: John W.

customer_reviews.title: Rocking kicks.
customer_reviews.text: They are the ones all the cool kids had when eye was a youngun
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy filtrking

customer_reviews.title: Great fit no joke
customer_reviews.text: Pro keds always been the best fitting sneakers for me I'm am always satisfied
customer_reviews.author: No

customer_reviews.title: Rubber parts not well glued together
customer_reviews.text: Love the style, but the quality sucks. The rubber sole parts came undon in the seams all over the place after a Short time. Get some better glue Keds.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Just as I remember ....I had the thought a few years why they were not available ..
customer_reviews.text: These are the real deal ...and they are as good and as cool as I remember ..I cant wait to buy two more pair to put up !!
customer_reviews.author: Greg Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Keds Throwback
customer_reviews.text: Nice old throwback in which I wore in Jr high school
customer_reviews.author: james t anderson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved it!! Used to wear when I was very young. Now I have it again. Fantastic!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jayme Rodrigo Perez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these are a major win. Simple and basic, yet unique and stylish
customer_reviews.author: Arville Brock-Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and great looking. I have received a lot of compliments. Old school look with a modern flair. Will purchase other colors in the spring.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mmmm suede
customer_reviews.text: Ridiculously comfortable casual fit sneaker - like wearing boat shoes - they keep getting more comfortable Nice classic looks , very happy
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Thorsen

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping, quality product, and great customer service support
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good shoe, i needed more arch support, fast shipping, and great customer service support
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find great shoes
customer_reviews.text: These have always been great shoes for me and I was thankful to find a pair, and at such a great price. The shoes are comfortable and sturdy. I prefer these over other shoes of this style (Vans or Converse).
customer_reviews.author: Andrew David Garland

customer_reviews.title: Thanks!!
customer_reviews.text: I like the feel and the look. Had these when I was a youngster. Bought 2 pairs, because I like them clean!!
customer_reviews.author: DGreene

customer_reviews.title: Superior Sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this shoe in blue and the same shoe in white. I chose to keep the white. This is a quality made shoe that fits well, is very comfortable, and looks great. I definitely prefer this style shoe, the Royal Plus Classic Suede over canvas sneakers, by any manufacturer. It really is suede too! As far as I'm concerned Pro-Keds beats Converse or any other sneaker manufacturer who makes retro style sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Don

product_meta.title: PRO-Keds mens PH56803 Royal Plus Classic Suede Blue Size: 6.5 UK
product_meta.description: Wolverine Suede Remastered Last for an enhanced fit Aluminum eyelets Off- white flat cotton laces Molded footbed with open cell foam for breathability Red and blue powerstripe details with an off-white midsole Classic gum outsole
feature_bullets: Remastered last for an enhanced fit
Red and blue power stripe details with an off-white midsole
